IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE EDUCATIONAL MATERIALS TO THE GENERAL PUBLIC REGARDING AMERICANISM CURRICULUM.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO EMPOWER AMERICANS TO UNDERSTAND, ENJOY AND PRESERVE THE FREEDOM AND MORAL RESPONSIBILITY EMBODIED IN AMERICA'S FOUNDING PRINCIPLES.
IRS990.Desc: ONLINE COURSES - DEVELOPED AND MAINTAINED K-12 ONLINE EDUCATIONAL COURSES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: MERCHANDISE SALES - SOLD EDUCATIONAL DVDS AND PAMPHLETS.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN CHARITABLE REMAINDER UNITRUSTS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ENDOWMENT FUNDS CONSISTING OF THE BENEFICIAL INTERESTS IN PERPETUAL TRUST AND CHARITABLE REMAINDER UNITRUSTS ARE INTENDED TO BE USED TO BENEFIT THE PROGRAMS OF THE ORGANIZATION.
GAIN ON BENEFICIAL INTEREST IN PERPETUAL TRUST 12,402. CHANGE IN VALUE ON CHARITABLE REMAINDER UNITRUSTS 12,455.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE G, PART I, LINE 2B COLUMN (III)
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONTRIBUTIONS RAISED BY THE JOHN BIRCH SOCIETY, INC. FOR AMERICAN OPINION FOUNDATION, INC. ARE FIRST RECEIVED BY THE JOHN BIRCH SOCIETY, INC. AND THE MONEY IS THEN DEPOSITED INTO THE AMERICAN OPINION FOUNDATION, INC.'S BANK ACCOUNT.

BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.RelationshipDescriptionTxt: THE JOHN BIRCH SOCIETY, INC. IS THE CREATOR OF AMERICAN OPINION FOUNDATION.
BusTrInvolveInterestedPrsnGrp.TransactionDesc: THE JOHN BIRCH SOCIETY IS CONTRACTED TO PERFORM FUNDRAISING AND SUPPORT SERVICES FOR THE ORGANIZATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE NUMBER OF CONTRIBUTIONS REPRESENTS THE NUMBER OF DONORS.

THE FOUNDATION USES THE JOHN BIRCH SOCIETY, INC. (JBS), A RELATED ORGANIZATION, TO HELP RAISE CONTRIBUTIONS FOR THE FOUNDATION. JBS MAY SOLICIT NON-CASH CONTRIBUTIONS SUCH AS STOCK FOR THE FOUNDATION.
DBA: FREEDOM PROJECT EDUCATION DBA: FREEDOM PROJECT ACADEMY DBA: FREEDOM PROJECT MEDIA DBA: AMERICAN OPINION FOUNDATION PUBLISHING DBA: FREEDOM PROJECT PARTNERSHIP

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ARTHUR THOMPSON, JOHN MCMANUS, LARRY GREENLEY AND GARY BENOIT HAVE A BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COMPLETE COPY OF THE FORM 990 IS PROVIDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR THEIR REVIEW BEFORE IT IS FILED WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE HEAD OF THE BOARD DETERMINES THE COMPENSATION OF THE TOP MANAGEMENT OFFICIAL AND THE OTHER OFFICERS OF THE ORGANIZAITON. INDEPENDENT PERSONS, COMPARABILITY DATA, AND CONTEMPORANEOUS SUBSTANTIATION OF THE DELIBERATION AND DECISION WERE USED IN 2005. SINCE THEN, THE HEAD OF THE BOARD HAS DETERMINED ANY NECESSARY ADJUSTMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AMERICAN OPINION FOUNDATION WILL MAKE ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
